Reviews.Title: A good buy
Reviews.Author: Tyler Quint
Reviews.Content: Appart from what the other guy said, this computer is a decent quality unit capable of running a lot of games. The hard drive is plenty big enough to hold your games and music, and with 3gb of ram its quite fast. I admit the graphics card is below todays games like call of duty modern warfare 2, but if you want a computer to run games like world of warcraft, or just surf the web or business then this is a great buy for the price!

Reviews.Title: Modern look, reliable and plenty of TOSHIBA features!!
Reviews.Author: gregory p. morris
Reviews.Content: I purchased this laptop 2 years ago and have had nothing but success in using it for my home business.  I do have the unit connected to my network for excessive periods of time and it has always stood up to the challenge of my small business operations.  Nice modern PC laptop for multiple lifestyle users... thumbs up Toshiba!

Reviews.Title: RIP OFF!!!
Reviews.Author: Jack Valentino
Reviews.Content: The computer itself is halfway decent. But I've had a number of problems with over the years from a failed cooling unit as well as a bad motherboard. Also, the power cable is an absolute piece of garbage. I've had to replace mine three times in just a few months! If you value your money, look elsewhere for a computer. I'm never buying a Toshiba again.
